claims.object: Modulation of targeted nerve fibers for therapeutic purposes

surface_layer.definition: The use of devices and methods to modulate nerve fiber activity for therapeutic benefit.

deep_layer.mechanism: Involves altering neuronal activity through electrical, magnetic, or chemical stimulation.
deep_layer.origin: Evolved from research in neuroscience and biomedical engineering.

epistemic_metadata.source: MODULATION OF TARGETED NERVE FIBERS - Patent application
